name: rustypaste
description: RustyPaste is a self-hosted pastebin service written in Rust. It provides secure paste storage with expiration, attachments, and a minimal web interface.

features.title: Text Pasting
features.description: Share code snippets, logs, or text through simple URLs

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and share files with automatic expiration

features.title: Syntax Highlighting
features.description: Display code with proper formatting for multiple languages

features.title: Expiration Control
features.description: Set automatic deletion times for pastes to manage storage

features.title: Cli Support
features.description: Upload pastes from the command line for scripting and automation

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate paste functionality into applications using REST endpoints

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure sensitive pastes with optional passwords

features.title: One
features.description: Create pastes that delete after being viewed once
